dataset_metadata.name: Immersive Investors – Pilot (Two Fully Mapped Cases)
dataset_metadata.description: Two deeply documented immersive investors (PIF and Miral) with linked projects, institutions, policies and people for prototyping the schema.
dataset_metadata.author: Martin Sambauer (martin-sambauer.com)
dataset_metadata.geographic_scope: global, with current focus on GCC/MENA

investors.description: Saudi Arabia’s sovereign wealth fund and key vehicle for giga-projects in tourism, culture and entertainment, including NEOM, Red Sea, Qiddiya, Diriyah and ROSHN.

fund_size_overall.note: Approximate AUM at the end of 2024 according to PIF’s annual report, as summarised in financial press.

immersive_investment.notes: Immersive relevance is via giga-projects that integrate themed entertainment, media architecture, cultural venues and destinations with strong storytelling components.

ticket_size.note: Acts as anchor investor and owner of giga-project vehicles rather than as a ticket-by-ticket investor.

ppp_profile.ppp_description: Uses project companies, development entities and partnerships with ministries, city authorities and private developers.

vision_alignment.explicit_immersive_mentions: Giga-projects are framed as key instruments of Vision 2030 to diversify the economy, attract tourists and build global cultural and entertainment destinations.

investors.notes: Serves as the financial backbone for several of the most visible destination projects globally. For immersive media, PIF matters primarily as owner of ecosystems where domes, experience centres and XR venues will be embedded.

sources.title: Public Investment Fund – Official Website
sources.note: General description of PIF and its strategic mandate.

sources.title: PIF – Giga-Projects
sources.note: Lists PIF giga-projects including NEOM, Red Sea, Qiddiya and DIRIYAH.

investors.description: Abu Dhabi-based master developer and operator of leisure, entertainment and cultural assets, recognised as the leading creator of immersive destinations and experiences on Yas Island and across Abu Dhabi.

fund_size_overall.note: No consolidated public AUM figure; Miral operates as developer/operator with project-based investment volumes.

immersive_investment.notes: Portfolio includes indoor theme parks, water parks, marine life park and art-driven immersive experiences on Yas Island and in Abu Dhabi.

ticket_size.note: Acts as primary sponsor and operator of large-scale venues; individual project budgets are substantial but not systematically disclosed as ticket sizes.

ppp_profile.ppp_description: Works in close partnership with Abu Dhabi government entities and global IP owners (Disney, Warner Bros., Ferrari) to develop attractions that serve tourism and soft power aims.

vision_alignment.explicit_immersive_mentions: Miral is repeatedly described as Abu Dhabi’s creator of immersive destinations and experiences and a core pillar of the emirate’s tourism strategy.

investors.notes: Miral is a key reference case for a vertically integrated destination developer that curates an entire island as a connected immersive entertainment ecosystem.

sources.title: Miral – Official Website
sources.note: Corporate overview and positioning.

sources.title: Miral: all you need to know about Abu Dhabi’s developer of immersive destinations
sources.note: Background article on Miral’s structure and portfolio.

institutions.name: Qiddiya Investment Company
institutions.role_in_immersive: Project company leading Qiddiya City, an entertainment, sports and culture destination with strong immersive potential (theme parks, media-based attractions, e-sports and live entertainment venues).

sources.title: PIF – Giga-Projects: Qiddiya
sources.note: Qiddiya described as cultural, sports and entertainment city.

institutions.name: Diriyah Company
institutions.role_in_immersive: Development entity for Diriyah, a heritage- and culture-led destination that re-stages the birthplace of the Kingdom through museums, cultural venues, events and experiential urban environments.

sources.title: Diriyah announced as PIF’s fifth giga-project
sources.note: Describes Diriyah as PIF giga-project aligned with tourism and culture strategy.

institutions.name: Miral
institutions.role_in_immersive: Master developer orchestrating the planning and build-out of Yas Island and other entertainment districts in Abu Dhabi.
institutions.notes: In this dataset Miral appears as both an investor and an institution, reflecting its dual role as capital provider and development company.

sources.title: Miral: all you need to know about Abu Dhabi’s developer of immersive destinations
sources.note: Describes Miral’s role as developer, manager and operator.

projects.notes: Large-scale future city initiative; immersive relevance is embedded in urban experience design, mobility, architecture and narrative environments.

sources.title: PIF – Giga-Projects: NEOM
sources.note: NEOM listed as PIF giga-project.

projects.notes: 376 km² entertainment, sports and culture city positioned to offer “the most innovative and immersive experiences”.

sources.title: Qiddiya – PIF Giga-Projects
sources.note: Describes Qiddiya as cultural, sports and entertainment destination with immersive experiences.

projects.notes: Regenerative tourism cluster where immersive media can be used for landscape interpretation, sustainability storytelling and high-end guest experiences.

sources.title: Saudi Arabia Giga Projects Overview – Red Sea
sources.note: Report summarising major Saudi giga-projects including Red Sea.

projects.notes: Heritage-led giga-project reinterpreting the birthplace of the Kingdom with cultural venues, museums and experiential urban spaces.

sources.title: HRH Crown Prince announces Diriyah as PIF’s fifth giga-project
sources.note: Details Diriyah’s role in tourism and culture strategy.

projects.notes: Indoor theme park combining coasters and media-driven experiences under Ferrari IP as part of the Yas Island cluster.

sources.title: Miral Destinations – Yas Island Overview
sources.note: Lists Ferrari World Yas Island as part of Yas Island’s attraction portfolio.

projects.notes: Indoor park built around Warner Bros. IP with extensive immersive set design and media-based attractions.

sources.title: Miral Destinations – Yas Island Overview
sources.note: Lists Warner Bros. World Abu Dhabi as a core attraction.

projects.notes: Marine life theme park with strong emphasis on education, exhibits and media-based storytelling about the ocean.

sources.title: Miral Destinations – Yas Island Overview
sources.note: Lists SeaWorld Yas Island Abu Dhabi as part of the Yas attraction portfolio.

projects.notes: Large-scale digital art experience by teamLab, positioned as a landmark immersive art destination.

sources.title: Miral Experiences – Portfolio
sources.note: Lists teamLab Phenomena Abu Dhabi in Miral’s portfolio.

projects.project_name: Disney Theme Park & Resort – Yas Island Abu Dhabi
projects.notes: Planned landmark Disney theme park resort and Disney’s first resort in the Middle East; Miral finances, builds and operates, Disney provides IP and creative design.

sources.title: The Walt Disney Company and Miral Announce Plans for Disney Theme Park and Resort on Yas Island
sources.note: Official announcement of the Disney resort with Miral as developer and operator.

policies.policy_name: Saudi Vision 2030 – Tourism, Culture and Entertainment Pillars
policies.relevance_to_immersive: Frames giga-projects and tourism/culture investments as core to economic diversification and soft power. Immersive media and experiences are not named as a separate sector but are embedded in the destination, culture and entertainment agenda.

sources.title: Saudi Arabia Giga Projects Overview
sources.note: Explains how giga-projects are part of Vision 2030.

people.name: Yasir Al-Rumayyan
people.role_title: Governor of the Public Investment Fund
people.public_stance_on_immersive: As PIF’s Governor, he frequently highlights giga-projects and tourism as key pillars of Saudi Arabia’s economic transformation, indirectly framing immersive destinations as strategic assets.

sources.title: PIF Governance – Board and Governor
sources.note: Identifies Yasir Al-Rumayyan as Governor of PIF.

people.name: Yasir A. AlSalman
people.public_stance_on_immersive: Commentary on the valuation of giga-projects and their role in PIF’s portfolio links financial performance to the broader transformation of Saudi Arabia’s tourism and destination landscape.

sources.title: PIF: Giga-projects and some unanswered questions
sources.note: Article referencing PIF’s CFO and valuation of giga-project portfolio.

people.name: Mohamed Abdalla Al Zaabi
people.public_stance_on_immersive: Public statements position Yas Island as a global entertainment destination built around immersive attractions, IP partnerships and year-round events.

sources.title: Miral: all you need to know about Abu Dhabi’s developer of immersive destinations
sources.note: Profile mentioning Mohamed Abdalla Al Zaabi as Group CEO.

people.name: Julien Kauffmann
people.public_stance_on_immersive: Responsible for an award-winning portfolio of theme parks and experiences, including Ferrari World, Warner Bros. World, SeaWorld Yas Island and teamLab Phenomena Abu Dhabi.

sources.title: Miral Experiences – Leadership
sources.note: Lists Julien Kauffmann as CEO of Miral Experiences and outlines his portfolio responsibility.
